Keywords: Arakko , Mystical , Warrior
Real Name: Unknown
Special Powers
(+5 POINTS) SWORD BEARER: This character starts the game with any Sword equipment equipped.
TWISTING, WEAVING, GROWING: When Redroot the Forest uses Smoke Cloud, after resolutions you may generate a Twisting Vine bystander [MAX 3] in a square with a hindering terrain marker generated during that action. // FREE: Choose one to generate in a square within 6 squares and line of fire:
*A hindering terrain marker
*A Twisting Vine bystander [MAX 3].
SHIFTING FOLIAGE: Plasticity, Stealth. // FREE: Place Redroot the Forest in a square of hindering terrain within 6 squares and line of fire.

Comments
September 27, 2022
Rurouni KJS
"Make an attack with BCF, you don't even have to hit" Incorrect. BCF reads: "When [you make] a close attack against a single target and [hit], you [I]may[/I] roll d6" — meaning BCF doesn't activate or have any effect until the hit lands. That said, I like the finesse of this character. She's not one to be your main attacker (and at 60 points, why would she be?) but with her FREE placement ability she can wend her way to the front line to back up other fighters.
September 5, 2022
tidge
This SR is definitely on the soft side, and the heavy reliance on hindering terrain (for mobility, offense, defense) is troubling. On paper, the Twisting Vines ability to reduce adjacent enemies attack/defense values looks like it could be useful, but practically (range/adjaceny requirements) I think this would be a hard trick to pull off without teammates that ALSO can generate hindering terrain... otherwise the investment in 60+ points for Redroot isn't generating damage to opponent dials. If Redroot is on a team with other Sword Bearers, I would suggest that one of the OTHER Sword Bearers be given Alluvium (Smoke Cloud) to wield, and Redroot be given Pogg Ur-Pogg (Giant Reach: 3), as this will off some better synergy to make use of this figure's tricks.
September 5, 2022
fghrt
Lowkey really interested in this character. Great repositioning FOR FREE. Keeps its stealth relevant with permanent markers in addition to smoke cloud. Makes some weird plant lads... Then add the sword it comes with which give smoke after BCF: Make an attack with BCF, you don't even have to hit, then free reposition AND stealth - VERY interesting.
